snippet: A provincial court sentenced the nation’s former top drug official to life in prison on Thursday for drug trafficking, the prosecutor said.
abstract: Provincial court in Cambodia sentences Moek Dara, the nation’s former top drug official, to life in prison for drug trafficking.
lead_paragraph: A provincial court sentenced the nation’s former top drug official to life in prison on Thursday for drug trafficking, the prosecutor said.

headline.seo: Cambodia: Former Top Drug Official Is Sentenced to Life for Trafficking
headline.main: Cambodia: Former Top Drug Official Is Sentenced to Life for Trafficking
headline.print_headline: Cambodia: Former Top Drug Official Is Sentenced to Life for Trafficking
